entry.title: Managing multiple Eclipse workspaces.
entry.content:
Managing multiple Eclipse workspaces.

Show how to manage multiple Eclipse workspaces. Each with different plugins.

Maybe explain how to re-use configuration across several workspaces?

Configuration options to export:
- Java Code Formatter
- Java Code Templates
- Java Save Actions
- Java Compiler Warnings Settings
-

Eclipse Content Assist Templates zeigen. Zusammmen mit JUnit-TestData kann man so einfach INSERTs/usw. für seine Tabellen erstellen
